message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to consider $18,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your latest offer. However, I am willing to pay $16,000 for the product. Would you be open to this proposal?
